text: Benedict Ganesh Singh (2 December 1927 - 12 September 2018) was a Guyanese Roman Catholic bishop. Singh was born in Lusignan, Demerara, Guyana and was ordained to the priesthood in 1954. He served as titular bishop of Arsennaria and was auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Georgetown, Guyana, from 1971 to 1972. He then served as bishop of the diocese from 1972 to 2003.Diocese of Georgetown He was the first native born Guyanese bishop. ==Notes== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Guyanese Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Demerara-Mahaica
title: Benedict Ganesh Singh
